this is the perfect place on a beautiful san diego afternoon to just walk and look at people!
We had such a great time strolling slowly on the Harbourside. The little shops are very cute and idyllic, nice place for lunch.

Lots to see walking around the Embarcadero. Anthony's Fish Grotto is there, Star of India ship and other antique ships there, sculptures, people watching and great water views.
In 2014 there was lots of construction taking place along the Embarcadero. This year we got to enjoy all of the work and it's fantastic! Lots more places to sit and relax. More... read more

We walked the length of the whole Embarcadero area starting from where the Cruise Boats depart to the end of the Convention Center. Beautiful to see all the boats in the Marina.
